document.full_text: president abdoulaye wade said that he had no plans to leave office as long as his health held up, and that his country would not see uprisings like those in north africa.
document.title: africa: senegal: president, 85, sees no need to step down
lines_and_colors: president abdoulaye wade said that he had no plans to leave office as long as his health held up, and that his country would not see uprisings like those in north africa.
